title: Mango Chicken Rice Bake
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '6 skinless chicken thighs', '80g chopped onion', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '350ml water', '100g uncooked white rice', '165g mango, peeled, pitted and chopped', '25g chopped fresh coriander', '1 spring onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 teaspoon red curry paste', '1 teaspoon chicken stock', '1 teaspoon tarragon vinegar']
